meanings.definition: A round, deep dish used for holding food or liquid.
meanings.sent1: I put soup in the bowl.
meanings.sent2: The cat drank milk from the bowl.
meanings.sent3: The bowl on the table was full of fruit.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a bowl, big and round.
meanings.sent5: The bowl gleamed in the sunlight, inviting me to eat.

meanings.definition: The act of rolling a ball in a game of bowling.
meanings.sent1: He got a strike in the first bowl.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sound of the pins falling after a good bowl.
meanings.sent3: The bowl competition was intense but fun.
meanings.sent4: His bowling technique was as smooth as a bowl rolling down a hill.
meanings.sent5: The bowl echoed through the bowling alley, signaling a perfect shot.

meanings.definition: To participate in a game of bowling.
meanings.sent2: I want to bowl with my friends this weekend.
meanings.sent3: She decided to bowl instead of watching a movie.
meanings.sent4: He will bowl against the champion next week.
meanings.sent5: Let's bowl our way to victory in the tournament.
